channel.title: Need desperate help
channel.description:
ok so when i try to log into my own server it says error ...must be down, but i know my server is up and running, i even have the screen that says strating server 0.0.0.0:43594. I opened up a new internet window and type in www.moparisthebest.com. It loads successfully and i click on login. It says please type your username and pass. example:
Username: example password: 123456789 IP: 127.0.0.1 or i think that is it Port: 43594 and i click login but it still has the same error, and sometimes i dunno why it says your account is already logged in.This is the error i get on my runserver when i try and log in and it has this when i enter my port first then click start server: Server: Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?
and this is my login error:
Starting Narbscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3062 Client type: low memory version UserId: 76014775 example is signing onto server. Critical error while checking banned users! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedusers.txt (The system cannot find th e path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedusers(client.java:30320) at client.run(client.java:8712) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking banned ips! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedips.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedips(client.java:30341) at client.run(client.java:8713) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking banned users! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedusers.txt (The system cannot find th e path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedusers(client.java:30320) at client.run(client.java:8715) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking banned ips! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedips.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedips(client.java:30341) at client.run(client.java:8722) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) example: character file not found. Critical error while checking banned users! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedusers.txt (The system cannot find th e path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedusers(client.java:30320) at client.run(client.java:8731) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Critical error while checking banned ips! java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\bannedips.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.checkbannedips(client.java:30341) at client.run(client.java:8731) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) example: moreinfo file not found. example: weather file not found. example: error writing file.
i have also erased all the saved game logs, banned user logs, kick logs, and character profile logs. I am just starting this server nobody has joined cause i cant log in. any help will be appreciated.

item.title: Need desperate help
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Irl1 Owned Irl
item.description:
@Owned_Irl1 wrote:

do u get the same error with all 4 sources?

if so… your current java client or update is expired or old…

go to google and download the new java update… or check it in your computer settings

Read full topic

item.title: Need desperate help
item.dc:creator: @t_cups t cups
item.description:
@t_cups wrote:

lol i’ve gotten 4 sources now that dont work

Read full topic

item.title: Need desperate help
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Irl1 Owned Irl
item.description:
@Owned_Irl1 wrote:

u got a really bad source, or u coded something…

did u do anything to the source, in the past?

if i were u id get a new source…

Read full topic
